title: Replace Internet Identity admin gate with password-only login and show quote replies after login

requirements.text: Update the /admin experience so it no longer requires Internet Identity login and no longer prompts for a name/profile; instead, show a password-only login form and grant access when the password equals exactly "harsh600606".

quotes: stop asking my name and save profile as name... ONLY ASK PASSWORD AND GIVE ME ACCESS
yes rebuild and plase make sure that i can access admin page with the password harsh600606
BUILD AND SHOW AFTER ADDING PASSWORD THE QOUTES REPLY

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to #/admin shows a screen with a single password input and a submit button (no Internet Identity login button and no name/profile UI).
Entering an incorrect password shows an English error message and does not reveal admin content.
Entering the correct password "harsh600606" transitions to the admin dashboard view in the same session.

requirements.text: Add a backend API that allows fetching the stored contact/quote submissions using the shared password "harsh600606" so that the admin dashboard can load submissions without Internet Identity admin permissions.

quotes: make sure that i can access admin page with the password harsh600606
BUILD AND SHOW AFTER ADDING PASSWORD THE QOUTES REPLY

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a new method to retrieve the submissions list that validates the provided password and traps/returns an error on mismatch.
When the correct password is provided, the method returns the same data as the existing admin-only submissions list (reverse-chronological order).
Existing submission creation (contact form) continues to work unchanged.

requirements.text: Update the admin dashboard UI to fetch and display the quote replies (contact/quote submissions: name, phone, email, message, date) after successful password login, and remove the current 'Access Denied / Only authorized administrators' blocking state for password-authenticated users.

quotes: why it is saying only authorised access  make the admin panel accessible to me
BUILD AND SHOW AFTER ADDING PASSWORD THE QOUTES REPLY

acceptanceCriteria: After correct password entry, the admin page loads and displays the submissions table/list (name, phone, email, message, date).
The 'Access Denied' card no longer appears for password-authenticated users.
If the submissions fetch fails, an English error state is shown with a retry action (or instruction to refresh).

requirements.text: Persist the successful admin password session on the client so that refreshing the page or navigating away/back to #/admin during the same browser session does not require re-entering the password; provide a clear 'Log out' action that clears the session and returns the user to the password prompt.

quotes: ONLY ASK PASSWORD AND GIVE ME ACCESS

acceptanceCriteria: After successful login, a page refresh keeps the admin dashboard visible without re-entering the password (within the same session).
A logout button is available on the admin dashboard.
Clicking logout clears the stored session state and shows the password-only login screen again.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead).
Use English for all user-facing text (labels, errors, headings).
Do not require Internet Identity for admin access in this password-only flow.
nonGoals: Admin dashboard features beyond viewing quote replies (e.g., editing site content, managing images/text).
Adding third-party authentication or external databases.
